imdb.plot outline: How many times has your love been put to test? To what extent will you go to rescue your partner? Channel[v] launches the biggest and the first ever romance - meets - adventure reality show - [v] Kidnap that will put the strength of your relationship to the test. We catch love struck couples put to test every moment that they have spent together. This thrilling show will test relationships while throwing a new twist at every corner.
imdb.title: [v] Kidnap
